Text: Thank you! I was sad because I thought you had stopped uploading due to other commitments. You are a true hero to countless people world-wide.
Thank you, I am so happy to see this episode. You are the only one uploading this show and there are so many of us that are relying on you for our Heartland fix. We all appreciate your committment.
good to have you back; will u be posting Blackstone, Good Dog, Endgame?  the remaining eps of Shattered?
